## Notch Prompter v1.0.0

First open-source release of Notch Prompter.

### What is included

- Native macOS teleprompter aligned to notch/camera area
- Floating always-on-top script window
- Smooth auto-scroll with speed controls
- Global keyboard shortcuts
- Privacy mode for screen-share/recording workflows

### Installation

1. Download `NotchPrompter.dmg` from this release.
2. Open the DMG and drag `NotchPrompter.app` to `Applications`.
3. Launch `NotchPrompter`.
4. Grant Accessibility permission when prompted.

### Notes

- Minimum supported OS: macOS 13.0
- Source repository: https://github.com/radhakishan404/notch-prompter
